name: Digital exhibition: sharing as a bridge between people
name_original: Digital exhibition: sharing as a bridge between people
description:
A digital exhibition with a theme of sharing as a bridge between people.

https://crowg27.itch.io/lightening is included in this exhibition.

Curator: Mike, Cecilia, Zhenglin, Zizhe, Orlic

Control: WASD to play the puzzle, arrow keys to control movements
